mapper.insert: insert into order_item(o_id, g_id, quantity, cost, price) values (#{o_id}, #{g_id}, #{quantity}, #{cost}, #{price})
mapper.select: select oi_id, o_id, g_id, quantity, cost, price from order_item
select order_item.oi_id, order_item.o_id, order_item.g_id, order_item.quantity, order_item.cost, order_item.price, goods_info.name from order_item, goods_info where order_item.g_id = goods_info.g_id
